page.title: 05A BIRTHDAY PARTY
page.content: If you go to a party you will play some games like Hide-and-Seek where somebody counts and all the rest run and hide. You could play Hunt the Sweet where you go upstairs while someone hides some sweets. Then you come down and find one. Only one because there will be one for everybody. And when you have found one you sit down and let the others find one. At a party you have special things to eat like jelly, ice-cream, sandwiches, crisps, peanuts and a special big birthday cake. You always take a present to a birthday part
